name: Cyber Pirates
description:
Cyber Pirates is a short 2D Retro Cyberpunk Style arcade shooter. 

Features:

- Versatile Enemies
- Various Powerups
- Vibrant sound and particle effects
- 'Music Slaps' - Steve Halliwell, 2020 
- Powerful Boss

Developers:

Reuben Norris

Connor Smith

Matt Lyon

This project was worked on by a small group of blooming game developers at SAE. This is a Student project and is not meant to be a marketable product!
